newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - CMP Media begun as buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - CMP Media begun as buy.

text.p: Furman Selz said on Tuesday it started coverage of CMP Media with a buy rating.
-- Analyst Karen Ficker said in a research note her fiscal 1997 earnings estimate was $0.90 per share and her 1998 fiscal earnings estimate was $1.13 per share.

-- "As a leading technology publisher, CMP Media operates in one of the fastest growing sectors of the publishing industry, which has enabled the company to successfully pursue an aggressive growth strategy while participating in a somewhat more mature publishing industry," Ficker said.
